turns.text: Okay Lowell so Id like to know um what what do you do in lawn and garden what uh whats whats of interest to you and how do you go about it
turns.label: o

turns.text: Well I have town home so I dont do lot of regular maintenance but I do have large garden out in back so we do lot of things with perennials and uh also few annual plants uh and then every year I grow garden
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh you do you do actually uh grow garden to produce food
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Yes
turns.label: ny

turns.text: uh-huh So how much room do you have
turns.label: b

turns.text: Um we have virtually no room out in front and then in the back Id say we have about an eighth of an acre --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and we pretty much fill it up with uh like I said perennials things that arent dont have to fool with every year but then Ive got uh twenty-five by twenty area that I do gardening as far as you know tomatoes and cucumbers and beans and -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh thats what I was curious about I was wondering whether you had actually some of the flowers that you had planted were bulb type that you would dig up and and then put down your garden and then put them back in later or something like that So you -
turns.label: bk

turns.text: No we have separate area for the garden
turns.label: nn

turns.text: uh-huh you do have separate area
turns.label: b

turns.text: Yeah and last year was the first year we tried two new things We tried corn and --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- we tried watermelon
uh-huh Well tell me this uh Lowell do you en- do you enjoy doing that kind of work and --
turns.label: b

turns.text: Uh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- do you have the time to relax so that you can take advantage of it

I enjoy doing it on limited basis I dont think that if I - the reason I bought townhouse is so that I wouldnt - I get - Im allergic to grass So I dont mow grass or anything like that So I think if I had big home and big lawn Id I dont believe I would enjoy it But just on the limited basis that I do it I do enjoy it very much
turns.label: na

turns.text: uh-huh Well Im little more fortunate I think from that point of view Im not allergic to things and I moved here in State College quite while ago and was fortunate to get some land So actually I have nine acres
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh wow
turns.label: ba

turns.text: And uh for many years I grew sweet corn uh and and my kids were there and so we set up shop there and uh I would uh collect the corn very carefully ear by ear and it was never more than one to two hours old and people came from miles and miles around to get that corn because they knew it was individually picked and very very fresh
turns.label: sd

turns.text: How about that
turns.label: ba

turns.text: So we had nice thing going there and it was delicious Huh I really enjoyed that and then I also have garden Oh its probably uh twenty-five by thirty or forty something like that that I put in my normal food garden things each year and uh I have little bit of everything or whole lot of everything in the - actually I love uh broccoli brussels sprouts and I have all kinds of tomatoes kale and all those good things and I rent out my field that I used to plant in sweet corn to local farmer and then he plants about quarter of an acre of sweet corn for me to use so I get out of that amount of work at any rate
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well thats nice
turns.label: ba

turns.text: It is it is very very nice I I really enjoy it My problem is not having enough time to do the job as completely and as thoroughly as I would like I enjoy it very much
turns.label: sd

turns.text: That much land requires an awful lot of time
turns.label: bf

turns.text: Yes it does Uh and actually I had pony there for twenty-five years and he had two acres that he had for his own grazing
turns.label: aa

turns.text: How about that
turns.label: ba

turns.text: So he had his own backyard garden too But that that worked out very nicely too I built him barn back there where in the part of my corn field and he lived in that but uh as far as gardening is concerned we do enjoy it My wife is in charge of the flowers She does all of the flower gardening throughout the whole property and we have you know an acre an acre and half that the house is sitting in the middle of and she has flower gardens and bulbs perennials and things We have blueberries blackberries I have two or three uh apple trees the Golden Delicious were fantastic this year My neighbor has pear trees and um oh blueberries all kinds of food around there if we just had time to take advantage of it My wife has spent probably I dont know how many hours in the last two or three weeks canning pears because there were so many of them and I have been totally engulfed with Golden Delicious apples I just couldnt handle the the amount of them we got this year Its really been remarkable year
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well I bet you could answer question for me Whats good apple to bake pies with
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I use my Golden Delicious and they make delicious pies
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Are there - - theres an afflu- -
turns.label: qy
